Dear Mr# Paulu:
I am writing you in order to determine in a preliminary way whether
your NAEB tape network might be interested in a series of non¬
commercial, educational programs to be produced by the Aerojet-General
Corporation in cooperation with the University of Southern California.
Briefly, the series would be of a scientific nature and would deal
with aeronautics, rocketry, propulsion, and space matters (now more
popularly called astronautics). As you know, Aerojet-General Corpora¬
tion is one of the world's largest builders of rockets, rocket engines
and associated equipment in addition to being a leader in the free
world's scientific research and development.
¥e feel that we have an interesting and informative story to tell
from an educational point of view and we would welcome the opportunity
to discuss this matter with you further. If you feel that you will be
interested in discussing this project, perhaps we can "get together"
at some mutually convenient time. If you will drop me a note with
your ideas on the subject, we can plan the general material for the
series according to your desires and have an idea of where we stand
before proceeding further.
Thank you for your interest and consideration, I shall anticipate
hearing from you by return mail.
Sincerely,
